The organization said it would offer its support to students and their families who have been affected by the lockdown. The group will be working with the Scottish government and the BBC's Scotland programme to produce a video for its website. The LEARN Network will also offer a free 24-hour support call if you wish to call the BBC's Scotland programme on 0800 787 775.
